record.field: How one roof brought a family closer together
How one roof brought a family closer together

div.class: T-I J-J5-Ji aQv T-I-ax7 L3 a5q
aSK J-J5-Ji aYr

br.span: The main reason people choose our opening roofs is that they want to
increase their outdoor spaceâ€™s livability
Take one of our recent projects.
In rural Mittagong, a family wanted to take full advantage of the breathtaking mountain views they see from their patio.
Unfortunately, the scorching sun we all know and love forced them to stay inside far too often.

They approached us to see if we could create a roof for their patio that would give them more outside time with friends and family. They also wanted a custom design that respected the existing timber frame and concrete columns of their home.
This is the result:

div.class: T-I J-J5-Ji aQv T-I-ax7 L3 a5q
aSK J-J5-Ji aYr

div.span:
Stunning, right? (Yes, we mean the mountains. But . . . if you donâ€™t mind us saying so, that opening roof isnâ€™t too bad either.)
Now, this family can spend quality time together outside, at any time of the day.
If you want to improve your familyâ€™s outdoor time together, contact us today.

You deserve a roof that brings you closer to the people you love, and we want to be the ones who build it for you.
Thank you,
The Team at Opening Roof Specialists
P.S. For more roof-inspiration, check out our recent projects:

record.field: Psst! What if . . . you could control the weather
Psst! What if . . . you could control the weather

div.class: T-I J-J5-Ji aQv T-I-ax7 L3 a5q
aSK J-J5-Ji aYr

br.span: If we could give you the power to control the weather, we would.
Unfortunately, we canâ€™t give you the power to call or calm storms. But we can offer the next best thing: a roof you can control.
Our opening roofs have louvres that rotate 170 degrees. That means you can close or open your roof throughout the day for sunshine, shade or ventilation to meet your needs.
So if you want to let more sunshine in or increase your shade coverage, you have the power.
The best part is that by controlling the angle of the louvres, you can also control the temperature.
Yes, you read that right.
Our roofs make you the master and commander over the temperature in your OUTDOOR space (which also filters through to your indoor space).
Pretty cool, right?
Get your personilised quote below:

span.span: Build an opening roof. Control the weather (mostly). Our gift to you.

br.span: Thank you,
The Team at Opening Roof Specialists
P.S. Discover all the benefits of an Eclipse Opening Roof:

record.field: When is a roof more than a roof
When is a roof more than a roof

div.class: T-I J-J5-Ji aQv T-I-ax7 L3 a5q
aSK J-J5-Ji aYr

br.span: We care deeply about whatâ€™s happening over your head. Literally. We believe that an opening roof is the most underappreciated (and most important) part of a home.

A roof is a shelter from the elements, yes. But ours are so much more. From the quality of our materials to our innovative designs, we help families create unique outdoor spaces to enjoy together. And we would love nothing more than to do that for you.
Here are a handful of reasons why we think you will love working with us:

li.span: They NEVER rust and will NEVER require a coat of paint. Seriously.
Even though you wonâ€™t need it, we still offer a MINIMUM 10-year warranty. (T & C apply) So you can sleep soundly at night, knowing that your opening roof system is protected for years to come.
Custom designs that suit your style
. Weâ€™re versatile! We offer more than 100 colours/textures and build our roofs to fit your vision.
Weâ€™re the best at what we do.
We have more than 30 years of experience delivering beautiful opening roofs with quality customer service satisfaction to match.
Weâ€™re with you every step of the way.
Our team is trained to make your roof project easy and hassle-free.

br.span: Starting your project is easy! Youâ€™ll meet with one of our
Opening Roof Specialists
Design Consultants before work even begins to make sure we get the measurements and specifications for your home just right.

b.span: Weâ€™re a family-owned and operated company, which is why we know that a roof is never just a roof.

record.field: Why the time for a new opening roof is now.
Why the time for a new opening roof is now.

div.class: T-I J-J5-Ji aQv T-I-ax7 L3 a5q
aSK J-J5-Ji aYr

br.span: We get it. A new roof is a huge commitment. There are costs involved and itâ€™s not a snap-your-fingers-and-it- happens kind of project.
But hereâ€™s the thing. You started looking for a new outdoor opening roof for a reason.
Maybe youâ€™re not able to enjoy your backyard right now. Maybe your current roof is damaged. If youâ€™re not able to fully enjoy your home and an opening roof could change that - why not go for it?
Here are some of the common objections we hear:
â€œBut itâ€™s too expensive!â€
Did you know that new roofs can INCREASE property value? A roof is an investment in the asset that is your home. And, we provide different payment options to suit your needs.
â€œIâ€™m not sure I can afford the upkeep.â€
We offer a 10-year warranty (T & Cs apply) so you donâ€™t have to worry about maintenance for the next decade. Our roofs are fret-free.
â€œFrankly, the process and time commitment worry me. Having people coming in and out of my house is not convenient.â€
In the words of one of our clients: â€œ
Being home with a newborn and having the installation made me a little nervous but the boys were nothing but respectful and courteous!â€ - Rebecca from Bondi
